bibl.title: Second Notes on Menander's Samia (Acts II-V).
bibl.note: By-product of work devoted to Menander's Samia during the preparation of a third volume for the new Loeb edition of Menander; cf. First Notes on Menander's Samia, ZPE 121 (1998) pp. 35-44. - 1. The Opening of Act II. - 2. Details of Text in Act II: Vv. 136, 156-58, 162, 167-71, 194-95, 203-205, 206-208, 215, 216, 218, 225-36, 251-52, 265-66, 230, 248, 251, 302, 373, 304-305, 305, 308, 315, 321-25, 340-42, 357, 366, 400, 450, 458-60, 478-79, 482-83, 505-506, 544, 560-61, 580-81, 584-85, 675, 680-81, 693-94, 703-705.
